pullRequest.body:
Co-authored-by: Javier López-Contreras <jlopezcontreras10@gmail.com>


---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

`+++ isLocalRing`
`+-- AtPrime.localRing`
`+--- localRing`

`- instance : LocalRing R⟦X⟧`
`- instance : LocalRing ℤ_[p]`
`- instance : MulSemiringAction G (LocalRing.ResidueField R)`
`- instance [DivisionRing K] : LocalRing K[ε]`
`- instance [LocalRing R] : LocalRing (MvPowerSeries σ R)`
`- tfae_of_isNoetherianRing_of_localRing_of_isDomain`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>
@j-loreaux ?! Did you forget to submit your review, maybe?
oops sorry.
Adding those deprecated aliases took me 20min by hand. I did it this time, but we have to find an automated way to do this.

:v: YaelDillies can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

It looks like you may have missed occurrences of `localRing` in declaration names (maybe you only searched for `LocalRing`?). Sorry I didn't catch these last time around.

bors d+
This is missing many deprecations

It looks like you may have missed occurrences of `localRing` in declaration names (maybe you only searched for `LocalRing`?). Sorry I didn't catch these last time around.

bors d+
This is changing the names of everything that follows, so they all need deprecations. (Loogle tells me there are 108 things total in the `LocalRing` namespace.)
The script didn't pick them up 😞
This one too.

and it will need a deprecation
```suggestion
theorem Ideal.iInf_pow_smul_eq_bot_of_isLocalRing [IsNoetherianRing R] [IsLocalRing R]
```

and it will need a deprecation
```suggestion
theorem Ideal.iInf_pow_eq_bot_of_isLocalRing [IsNoetherianRing R] [IsLocalRing R] (h : I ≠ ⊤) :
```

and a deprecation
```suggestion
theorem Ideal.isIdempotentElem_iff_eq_bot_or_top_of_isLocalRing {R} [CommRing R]
```

and a deprecation
```suggestion
theorem RingHom.domain_isLocalRing {R S : Type*} [CommSemiring R] [CommSemiring S] [H : IsLocalRing S]
```

+ deprecation
```suggestion
theorem bijective_of_isAlgClosed_of_isLocalRing
```

+ deprecation
```suggestion
theorem isField_of_isAlgClosed_of_isLocalRing
```

pullRequest.title: chore: rename `LocalRing` to `IsLocalRing`
